description.english: Complete the Basic Challenge using the first skin.
description.german: Erledige die Herausforderung „Einfach“, indem du das erste Skin benutzt.
description.french: Termine Défi Bases en utilisant la première skin.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Sfida normale usando la prima skin.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío Básico usando la primera skin.
description.japanese: Challenge Basic で最初のスキンをクリア

displayName.english: Good luck always come in threes
displayName.french: Les bon tours arrivent toujours par trois
displayName.italian: La buona fortuna non arriva mai da sola
displayName.spanish: A la tercera va la vencida
displayName.japanese: 二度あることは三度ある

description.english: Get three Score Bonuses in a row.
description.french: Obtiens trois bonus de points à la suite.
description.italian: Ottieni 3 bonus skin di fila.
description.spanish: Consigue tres bonificaciones seguidas.
description.japanese: SCORE BONUS を3回連続で達成

description.english: Complete 10 skins in a row in Skin Edit.
description.french: Termine 10 skins à la suite dans Skin perso.
description.italian: Completa 10 skin di fila in modalità Modifica skin.
description.spanish: Completa 10 skins seguidas en Editar Skin.
description.japanese: Skin Edit で連続10個のスキンをクリア

description.english: Clear at least 40 squares in 60sec Time Attack.
description.german: Lösche mindestens 40 Quadrate in „60 Sek. Auf-Zeit“
description.french: Efface au moins 40 carrés dans Contre-la-montre 60 s.
description.italian: Elimina almeno 40 quadrati nella modalità Sfida a tempo 60sec.
description.spanish: Termina al menos 40 cuadrados en Contrarreloj 60 seg.
description.japanese: Time Attack 60sec で40個以上の四角を消す

description.english: Clear at least 120 squares in 180sec Time Attack.
description.german: Lösche mindestens 120 Quadrate in „180 Sek. Auf-Zeit“
description.french: Efface au moins 120 carrés dans Contre-la-montre 180 s.
description.italian: Elimina almeno 120 quadrati nella modalità Sfida a tempo 180sec.
description.spanish: Termina al menos 120 cuadrados en Contrarreloj 180 seg.
description.japanese: Time Attack 180sec で120個以上の四角を消す

description.english: Clear at least 200 squares in 300sec Time Attack.
description.german: Lösche mindestens 200 Quadrate in „300 Sek. Auf-Zeit“
description.french: Efface au moins 200 carrés dans Contre-la-montre 300 s.
description.italian: Elimina almeno 200 quadrati nella modalità Sfida a tempo 300sec.
description.spanish: Termina al menos 200 cuadrados en Contrarreloj 300 seg.
description.japanese: Time Attack 300sec で200個以上の四角を消す

description.english: Complete all Easy Puzzles.
description.french: Termine tous les puzzles Facile.
description.italian: Completa tutti i puzzle facili.
description.spanish: Completa todos los Puzles Fáciles.
description.japanese: Puzzle で Easy の問題を全てクリア

description.english: Complete all Easy Missions.
description.french: Termine tous les missions Facile.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni facili.
description.spanish: Completa todas las Misiones Fáciles.
description.japanese: Mission で Easy の問題を全てクリア

description.english: Win Stage 1 playing against the CPU.
description.french: Gagne le tableau 1 en jouant contre la console.
description.italian: Vinci il livello 1 giocando contro la CPU.
description.spanish: Gana la Etapa 1 jugando contra la CPU.
description.japanese: VS CPU でステージ1の敵に勝利

description.english: Complete the Basic Challenge.
description.french: Termine Défi Bases.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Sfida normale.
description.spanish: Completa el desafío Básico.
description.japanese: Challenge Basic をクリア

description.english: Score 250,000 points in Skin Edit.
description.french: Marque 250 000 points dans Skin perso.
description.italian: Ottieni 250.000 punti nella modalità Modifica skin.
description.spanish: Puntúa 250 000 puntos en Editar Skin.
description.japanese: Skin Edit で25万点達成

description.english: Get ten Score Bonuses in a row.
description.french: Obtiens dix bonus de points à la suite.
description.italian: Ottieni 10 punteggi bonus di fila.
description.spanish: Consigue diez bonificaciones seguidas.
description.japanese: SCORE BONUS を10回連続で達成

description.english: Clear 10 or more squares in one timeline sweep.
description.german: Lösche 10 oder mehr Quadrate innerhalb eines Zeitliniendurchlaufs.
description.french: Efface 10 carrés ou plus en un passage du Rayon.
description.italian: Elimina 10 o più quadrati con un solo passaggio di linea temporale.
description.spanish: Termina 10 o más cuadrados en un barrido de la línea de tiempo.
description.japanese: タイムライン１回の通過で10個以上の四角を消す

description.english: Clear all blocks on the screen.
description.german: Lösche alle Blöcke auf dem Bildschirm.
description.french: Efface tous les blocs à l'écran.
description.italian: Elimina tutti i blocchi sullo schermo.
description.spanish: Termina todos los bloques en la pantalla.
description.japanese: ブロックの全消しを達成

description.english: Link 25 or more blocks together.
description.french: Relie au moins 25 blocs entre eux.
description.italian: Collega 25 o più blocchi.
description.spanish: Une 25 o más bloques juntos.
description.japanese: チェインブロック一つで25個以上のブロックを繋げる

displayName.japanese: スローモーションの世界
